attributes.action: Require people exempt from wearing face coverings to wear a face shield
attributes.additional_details: The Government has put in place exemptions to the requirement to wear face coverings for people who are unable to wear a face mask, but many of these people could wear a face shield. While this does not protect the user it can help reduce the risk of transmission to other people.
attributes.background: I want the Government to revise the rules on wearing face coverings to require people who are currently exempt from wearing a face covering to be required to wear a face shield in places where a face covering is currently required, unless they are medically unable to do so.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
